metahubs.title: Metahubs
metahubs.confirmDeleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete metahub "{{name}}"?

errors.pleaseSelectMetahub: Please select a metahub from the list

board.title: Metahub Board
board.description: Analytics and statistics for this metahub (in development)

members.title: Members
members.description: Users with access to this metahub

documentation.title: Explore Documentation
documentation.description: Learn about metahub features, API and best practices

hubs.title: Hubs
hubs.description: Data containers that define the structure of your metahub
hubs.emptyDescription: Create your first hub to start defining data structures

deleteDialog.title: Delete Hub
deleteDialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete this hub? All catalogs, attributes and records will be permanently removed.
deleteDialog.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this hub? This action cannot be undone.
deleteDialog.fetchError: Failed to check for blocking catalogs
deleteDialog.hasBlockingCatalogs: Cannot delete hub. The following catalogs require at least one hub and are only linked to this one:
deleteDialog.resolutionHint: To delete this hub, first add another hub to these catalogs or disable the "Hub required" option.

hubs.codenameHelper: Unique identifier for URLs (lowercase Latin letters, numbers, hyphens). Auto-generated from the name with transliteration. You can edit it manually.

validation.codenameInvalid: Use lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only

catalogs.title: Catalogs
catalogs.allDescription: All catalogs across all hubs in this metahub
catalogs.description: Directories that organize attributes and records within a hub
catalogs.emptyDescription: Create your first catalog to organize attributes and records

deleteDialog.title: Delete Catalog
deleteDialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete this catalog? All attributes and records will be permanently removed.

catalogs.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this catalog? This action cannot be undone.
catalogs.codenameHelper: Unique identifier for URLs (lowercase Latin letters, numbers, hyphens). Auto-generated from the name with transliteration. You can edit it manually.

validation.codenameInvalid: Use lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only

catalogs.isRequiredHubEnabled: Catalog must have at least one hub
catalogs.isSingleHubEnabled: Catalog can only be in one hub
catalogs.isSingleHubDisabled: Catalog can be visible in multiple hubs
catalogs.isSingleHubWarning: Cannot enable while multiple hubs are selected

attributes.title: Attributes
attributes.description: Define the fields for this catalog
attributes.emptyDescription: Add attributes to define the structure of your catalog data

deleteDialog.title: Delete Attribute
deleteDialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete this attribute? All data in this field will be lost.

attributes.codenameHelper: Unique field identifier (lowercase Latin letters, numbers, hyphens). Auto-generated from the name with transliteration. You can edit it manually.

validation.codenameInvalid: Use lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only

records.title: Records
records.emptyDescription: Add records to store data in this catalog
records.addAttributesFirst: Define attributes for this catalog before adding records
records.noAttributes: No attributes defined for this catalog. Add attributes first.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Record
deleteDialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete this record? This action cannot be undone.

members.title: Members
members.confirmRemoveDescription: Are you sure you want to remove {{email}} from this metahub?

errors.checkConnection: Please check your network connection and try again
